title: An Act relative to wastewater treatment and disposal in the town of Sandwich

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Xiarhos of Barnstable, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1073) of Steven George Xiarhos (by vote of the town) relative to wastewater treatment and disposal in the town of Sandwich.  Environment and Natural Resources.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Environment and Natural Resources

related_entities.name: committee on Environment and Natural Resources

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 04/08/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

related_entities.name: the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

actions.description: Committee reported that the matter be placed in the Orders of the Day for the next sitting
Read second and ordered to a third reading
